(Simplified: 踯)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 鄭 indicates the sound; 足 (foot) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 足 [ zú ] foot; to attain, to satisfy; enough
    • 鄭 [ zhèng ] state in today's Henan; surname
①(躑躅)徘徊不進，如“他躑躑在街頭”。
躑躅 [ zhí zhú ]: to tread; to tramp; to loiter; to hover around
躑躅而行 [ zhí zhú ér xíng ]: to shuffle along; to stagger (idiom)

躑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhí］
［《廣韻》直炙切，入昔，澄。］
“踯1”的繁体字。
(1)见“躑躅”。
(2)跳跃。
(3)蹬踢。

躑字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【足字部】　躑； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1235第34
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】直炙切【正韻】直隻切，?音擲。蹢，亦作躑。躑躅，行不進也。【後漢·隗囂傳】得以數千躑躅三輔。【註】躑躅，猶踟躕也。又【蘇竟傳】或躑躅帝宮。【註】謂上下不去也。【荀子·禮論篇】躑躅焉。詳躅字註。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Youth Collection】【Foot Character Department】　踯; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1235 Page 34
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Straight and cut [Zheng Yun] Straight cut only,? Toss.蹢, also make a foot. Hesitating, you can't make progress. [The Story of Kui Xiao in the Later Han Dynasty] I was able to walk around three auxiliary thousands of people. [Note] Hesitating, still hesitating. Also 【Su Jing Chuan】or walk around the imperial palace. [Note] It means that there is no going up and down. 【Xunzi·Ritual Theory】Hesitating. Note the words in detail.
